page.title: 05ACCOMMODATION IN ABERDYFI
page.content: Holiday accommodation dominates the village so much so that a local councillor managed to total the number of permanently resided in homes fronting on to Copperhill Street,the main street running inland from the village centre,on his fingers! The large terraced houses running parallel to the narrow coastal strip have been almost totally converted into holiday flats. Behind the busy sea front the quiet streets and squares contain rows of small 19th century terraced houses. Many have been purchased by people from outside the area as holiday homes and in many cases are available for weekly rental. Traditional bed and breakfast accommodation at one of the few guest houses or farms is also available.
